metadata.title: Characterizing regulatory path motifs in integrated networks using perturbational data
metadata.abstract: We introduce Pathicular http://bioinformatics.psb.ugent.be/software/details/Pathicular, a Cytoscape plugin for studying the cellular response to perturbations of transcription factors by integrating perturbational expression data with transcriptional, protein-protein and phosphorylation networks. Pathicular searches for 'regulatory path motifs', short paths in the integrated physical networks which occur significantly more often than expected between transcription factors and their targets in the perturbational data. A case study in Saccharomyces cerevisiae identifies eight regulatory path motifs and demonstrates their biological significance. © 2010 Joshi et al.; licensee BioMed Central Ltd.

description: Cytoscape plug-in that identifies path motifs in integrated networks and arranges them in a modular structure.
name: Pathicular
